CustomField.formula: IF(AND( FS_Total_CS_Units_On_Location__c = 0, FS_Total_SS_Units_on_Location__c =0, FS_Total_7000_Series_Units_On_Location__c =0, OR( FS_Total_CS_Units_Installed__c >0, FS_Total_SS_Units_Installed__c >0, FS_Total_7000_Series_Units_Installed__c >0)),TRUE,FALSE)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If Total Units on Location for all Series = 0 or Total Units Installed for all Series > 0 then this box will get checked.
CustomField.label: ALL FS Equipment Removed
